        public Integer waitFor(long timeout)
                throws InterruptedException
        Process.waitFor() with timeout
        Parameters:
        timeout - timeout in milliseconds
        Returns:
        process's exit value, or null if process was destroyed after timeout
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - if the waiting thread was interrupted
